title: ANES Perioperative Web database
description:
This is a web database solution used on the floor of Seoul National University Hospital.
Enhanced Recovery After Surgery (ERAS) is a monitoring service for patient-wide care from pre-patient to discharge, and Pre-operative patient evaluation is possible outside the hospital.
The Excel batch registration/modification for patient cases does not affect more than 1000 cases.
It's used by anesthesiologists and surgeons.

title: POSTCHAIN
description:
It has been developed to make up for the fact that the personal information on the bill in the mailbox can be abused for crime, and to manage a number of bills at once.
I participated in the 5th Software Convergence Hackathon as a development leader and formed the architecture, front and back columns.

title: FORTE API
description:
This is an API server that integrates and manages data that is passed between the team homepage, the payment agent (xsolla), and the decode bot.
We used AWS EC2 and built a code convention check - API server automated distribution infrastructure after code push.
I work as a backend developer in Team Crescendo.

title: Share U
description:
Share U, Sheer You has developed a service that allows people with a lot of experience to share their experiences with younger people.
I was in charge of server development at the 18th App Jam Hackathon.

title: Cadit
description: Cadit are services that automatically save a certain percentage of the amount that users spend on their daily lives.

title: Greta
description:
While watching a group of stepmothers, school clubs, student councils, and nonprofit organizations, the problem of internal division or embezzlement is occurring due to the untransparent accounting.
To solve these problems, people use Excel or Google SHIFT transparently to make books, but because they can do accounting fraud, they also create a service that allows them to make books that are transparent without being tampered with.
